content.query:
use nyc_taxi_ldw;

GO

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.taxi_zone') IS NOT NULL 
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone

GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone 
WITH (
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
    LOCATION = 'silver/taxi_zone',
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
)
AS
SELECT *
FROM bronze.taxi_zone;

GO 


SELECT TOP 10 * FROM silver.taxi_zone;


-- But you cannot run the this query more than once. 
-- Because if you execute drop statement it will drop the Metadata Not the Files written to the Folder.
-- (if you execute more than 1 ) it Will give an error that the files in folder is already exists.
